#### Lets goooo vectors
```{r}
pacman::p_load("tidyverse")
```

We are going to create and store a vector

```{r}
marmots = c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")
marmots
```
lets check the class

```{r}
class(marmots)
```
if all my values are number it will turn numeric 

```{r}
pika = c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5) 
pika
```
lets check the class

```{r}
class(pika)
```

If the values are integers you can do that too 

```{r}
bear = c(20L, 10L, 5L, 30L, 18L)
bear

#Lets Check

class(bear)
```

#### Adding Vectors

```{r}
#create some vectors 
ringtail= c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox = c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

#Now we add

ringtail+fox

#And subtract 
fox-ringtail
```
We can also add scalar multipliers and find the dot product

```{r}
#Multiplier
100*ringtail

#and dot product using %*%
ringtail%*%fox

#cool

```
